c:simple-property.name: username
c:simple-property.description: The user name to connect by JMX remoting

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: The password name to connect by JMX remoting

c:simple-property.name: host
c:simple-property.description: The host name to connect by JMX remoting

c:simple-property.name: port
c:simple-property.description: The port number to connect by JMX remoting

c:simple-property.name: discoveryFilter
c:simple-property.description: The JMX query filter (with * wildcard) used to discovery resources jboss.as:deployment=*,subdeployment=*,subsystem=web;jboss.as:deployment=*,subsystem=web

c:simple-property.name: bindingFilter
c:simple-property.description: In some case (i.e. datasource) discovery filter help me to find resources, but metric are collected by bindingFilter)

c:simple-property.name: frequency
c:simple-property.description: The frequncy of sampling. Map function runs every (frequency) seconds

c:simple-property.name: keyProperty
c:simple-property.description: Among keyProperty of ObjectName it identifies a unique id of the resource

c:simple-property.name: mapCode
c:simple-property.description: The function code that runs for each map phase (in groovy)

c:simple-property.name: reduceCode
c:simple-property.description: The function code that runs each time a getValues is called by central monitoring server
